string.value: The Storybook on the Goblin Story
I'm sure I received the storybook from Chumji after defeating 3 King Goblins. Where did it go? Should I go see Chumji again?

#b#p2040052## from Helios Tower Library has requested me to get #b#t4031238##k for him. Hmmm ... I'm pretty sure I received it after I defeated the King Goblins, but I can't seem to find it. After discussing the matters with Chumji, he promised to give me the storybook if I gather up #b10 #t4000173#s#k for him.\n\n#t4000173# #b#c4000173##k/10
I gave Chumji 10 #t4000173#s just as he requested to reacquire #t4031238#.
Hey there. Having fun traveling around places? I heard you've been helping out Wiz the Librarian lately. That definitely earns my respect. How can I help you today?

You lost the storybook that I gave you? Oh no ... you should have been more careful with it. Don't worry, though; I have another copy with me. Before I give you this, though, can you do me a favor? It is going to be a piece of cake for you.

It has been a tremendous relief for everyone here thanks to you eliminating 3 King Goblins, but the truth is there are still many Goblins roaming around the Black Mountain. Blins, especially, love to pull some nasty pranks on people, which is definitely a concern here. I want you to fight those Goblins and bring #b10 #t4000173#s#k to me. This should be easy for you, right?
This should not be difficult for you. Don't you need the storybook?
Did you bring it? Let's see... indeed, 10 brooms. Here's the storybook. Please take good care of it this time.

Now that the brooms are here, I think it'll be a good time for the people here and myself to sweep up and clean up this town. Lately our town has been frequently visited by the outsiders, and I thought our town could use some cleaning for quite some time. Anyway, so long~
If you defeat Blins, they'll cough up a #b#t4000173##k. Bring back #b10#k of those.
